title: Slack Connect
description: A real-time communication platform featuring workspace creation, channel-based messaging, and live presence indicators. Implemented socket-based updates for instant message delivery and secure JWT-based user authentication.

title: AirSona-An AI Driven AQI Solution
description: An intelligent environmental monitoring system that leverages machine learning to predict Air Quality Index (AQI). Features interactive heatmaps and historical data visualization to help users track pollution trends in real-time.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, high-performance developer portfolio built with a focus on UX and accessibility. Features a mobile-first responsive design, smooth scroll animations, and a centralized JSON-driven data architecture.

title: VisPro-Visual Product Matcher
description: An AI-powered computer vision tool that allows users to upload images to find matching products in a database. Utilizes image processing algorithms to identify key features and suggest similar retail items.

title: Distributor-Retailer Management System
description: A comprehensive B2B supply chain solution to manage inventory, orders, and billing between distributors and retailers. Includes an automated dashboard for low-stock alerts and transaction history tracking.

title: American Sign Language Detection System
description: A deep learning project designed to bridge communication gaps by translating ASL hand gestures into text in real-time. Features camera integration and a trained neural network for high-accuracy gesture recognition.

title: CRUD Operations System
description: A robust administrative dashboard for managing structured data. Features server-side validation, advanced filtering, search functionality, and a responsive UI for seamless record handling across devices.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A sleek weather application providing accurate 7-day forecasts and atmospheric insights. Built with a dynamic UI that adapts its color theme and background imagery based on current local weather conditions.
